caption: Agent
description: The data model defines a schema for AI agent content representation. The schema provides a way to describe agent's features, constraints, artifact locators, versioning, ownership, or relevant details.
name: agent

name.caption: Agent Name
name.description: The name of the agent. For example: Marketing Strategy Agent.

version.caption: Agent Version
version.description: The version of the agent. Values MAY conform to a specific versioning schema.

schema_version.caption: Schema Version
schema_version.description: Version of OASF schema used by the agent data model.

created_at.caption: Creation Time
created_at.description: Includes the creation timestamp. Value MUST conform to RFC 3339.

authors.caption: Authors
authors.description: Specifies the authors list of an agent.

annotations.caption: Annotations
annotations.description: Additional metadata associated with this agent.

locators.caption: Locators
locators.description: List of source locators where this agent can be found or used from.

extensions.caption: Extensions
extensions.description: List of extension models that describe this agent and its capabilities more in depth.

skills.caption: Skills
skills.description: List of skills associated with this agent.
